pkgmetadata.longdescription: Permutation Tests for Time Series Data // Helps you determine the analysis window to use when analyzing densely-sampled time- series data, such as EEG data, using permutation testing (Maris Oostenveld 2007) doi:10.1016/j.jneumeth.2007.03.024. These permutation tests can help identify the timepoints where significance of an effects begins and ends, and the results can be plotted in various types of heatmap for reporting.
